headline: Lead Service Line Replacement Funding & Compliance Tool Featured by Duke University CTSI, Advancing Nationwide Equitable Infrastructure Upgrades
summary: Free, multilingual planning tool, created by the former EPA Flint Emergency Coordinator, has been used to generate over $3 billion in estimated lead service line replacement project costs, advancing equitable water infrastructure planning nationwideCHICAGO, Aug. 19, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Environmental & Public Health International (EPHI) announced that its free, multilingual Lead Service Line Replacement Cost Calculator (LSLRCC), which has generated over $3 billion in estimated project costs

headline: Can PPL's Diversified Fuel Mix Drive Growth & Decarbonization?
summary: PPL aims to enhance grid reliability, reduce carbon emissions and lower costs for customers.
